snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo acknowledged that the measure was a long shot in the waning days of this year’s legislative session.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, embracing a top priority of government reformers and liberal groups, asks Legislature to enact system of public financing for state elections, modeled after one used in New York City; acknowledges measure is long shot in waning days of legislative session, but says it will help restore public’s trust in state government.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo acknowledged that the measure was a long shot in the waning days of this year’s legislative session.

headline.seo: Cuomo Pushes for Public Financing of State Elections
headline.main: Cuomo Pushes Legislators on Elections Financing
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Pushes Public Financing of Elections
